books.description: A dystopian novel depicting a totalitarian regime and constant surveillance.

books.description: A poetic story of a young prince who explores planets and human nature.

books.description: The saga of the Buendía family and the town of Macondo.

books.description: A romantic novel of manners that explores marriage and social class.

books.description: A philosophical novel about guilt, redemption, and morality.

books.description: A story of teenage angst and alienation in post-war America.
